"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54fa62a363687210ea620500#post_54fa62a363687210ea620500
Only thing missing was the bed it self 
The closet was empty but the curtains and slipper were fine.
I had to force the door open because my friend was to scared. The dust went crazy and the room itself didn't have much light until I opened the curtains.
I would have taken pictures but I had to swim and my phone would have gotten wet.

Also later that day in the woods I found a machete
